translations: 接近的；<方>直接的；在左边的

sentences.sentence: I had to pay nigh on forty dollars for it.
sentences.translation: 我不得不为它支付了近40美元。

sentences.sentence: Defence was well-nigh impossible against such opponents.
sentences.translation: 遇到这样的对手几乎防不胜防。

sentences.sentence: After running seven miles or so, Pinocchio was well-nigh exhausted.
sentences.translation: 跑了七英里左右，皮诺乔几乎累坏了。
